page.title: 13Games Children Play
page.content: My favourite game is climbing trees. When my cousin comes to stay we have a great time finding trees to climb.Most boys of my age have gone crazy about football and transformers.These are plastic toy cars which can change into robots.In the Autumn children like to play conkers. The girls are always skipping in groups or just on their own. Red Rover is a game where one boy tries to run through a line of boys without being caught. Games at school are 'Sticky Toffee', 'Tag' 'Rabbit Run' and 'Run Away Train'. These are all chasing games.Boys also like to make 'Go-carts' out of old pram wheels and bits of wood.
